comments.body: Do you know why there is an edge from C:2 to F:3?

@penpornk _MklConv2D has 4 outputs - `[0]` Conv2D output, `[1]` filter in MKL layout, `[2]` meta-info for Conv2D output, and `[3]` meta-info for filter in MKL layout. Since Conv2D output of _MklConv2D is feeding _MklSlice, it also feeds corresponding meta-info to _MklSlice.
Got it. Thank you for the explanation!

How much effort would it take to make the formatting consistent to the rest of the file, i.e.,
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/1b905ca658e042403d7e788d3e58ec81a7833345/tensorflow/core/graph/mkl_layout_pass_test.cc#L673-L689
?

Do you have a formatter for this? It's easier to read (and saves space) when it's more compact.

We don't have any format tool for this, even minor changes need manually fix...

I don't think we can format my 2 cases as the example you provide. It's true the example you provide is neat and graceful, because it's a relatively simple case that all "attr" can be spanned in a single line. My cases are more complicated that "attr" would span a few lines (i.e. tensor_content), so I'd rather keep it as the prototxt format (attributes spans in lines), which is a standard output protobuf recommend.

But you're right, we should make the format friendly to read. I've made some changes to use consistent indentations in my cases. Currently the format is strictly the standard "prototxt" format, which is easy to read I think.

Got it. Thank you for clarifying and for making the changes!
Would you mind changing the formatting here (multiple one-line strings) to a multi-line string like the rest of the file?
My last question hasn't been addressed. (About changing the formatting in lines 1042-1081 from multiple one-line strings to one multi-line string like the rest of the file.)

TEST_F(MklLayoutPassTest, NodeMerge_TransposeConv3DTranspose_Positive) {
  InitGraph(
      "node { name: 'Input0' op: 'Input'}                                     \
       node { name: 'Input1' op: 'Input'}                                     \

comments.body: There already are `NodeRewrite_FusedConv2D_Positive4` and `NodeRewrite_FusedConv2D_Positive5` tests in lines 1415 and 1444. Please rename the tests so they all have unique names.
Please add another (negative) test case where `mode != "SCALED"`.

Since previous section titles look like this,
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/a044d650c4d7b731a435cfb216d64629e20b6202/tensorflow/core/graph/mkl_layout_pass_test.cc#L168-L170

This line full of slashes probably belongs to
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/a044d650c4d7b731a435cfb216d64629e20b6202/tensorflow/core/graph/mkl_layout_pass_test.cc#L2554-L2556

Please move it there.

Please also fix the title below to make the look uniform.
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/a044d650c4d7b731a435cfb216d64629e20b6202/tensorflow/core/graph/mkl_layout_pass_test.cc#L2587-L2592
